analyzed: haṃsa dūtam
dukūlam bibhrāṇaḥ dalita haritāla dyuti bharam

original: parānandābhogaḥ sphuratu hṛdi me ko.api puruṣaḥ //1
analyzed: para ānanda ābhogaḥ sphuratu hṛdi me kaḥ api puruṣaḥ
yadā yātaḥ gopī hṛdaya madanaḥ nanda sadanān
mukundaḥ gāndinyāḥ tanayam anuvindan madhupurīm
tadā amānkṣīt cintā sariti ghana ghūrṇā paricayaiḥ
agādhāyām bādhā maya payasi rādhā virahiṇī
kadācid kheda agnim vighaṭayitum antargatam asau
saha ālībhiḥ lebhe taralita manāḥ yāmuna taṭīm
cirāt asyāḥ cittam paricita kuṭīra kalanāt
avasthā tastāra sphuṭam atha suṣupteḥ priya sakhī
tadā niṣpanda aṅgī kalita nalinī pallava kulaiḥ
parīṇāhāt prema nāma kuśala śata āśaṅki hṛdayaiḥ
dṛś ambhaḥ gambhīrīkṛta mihira putrī laharībhiḥ
vilīnā dhulīnām upari parivavre parijanaiḥ
tatas tām nyasta aṅgīm urasi lalitāyāḥ kamalinī
palāśaiḥ kālindī salila śiśiraiḥ vījita tanum
parāvṛta śvāsa aṅkura calita kaṇṭhim kalayatām
sakhī sandohānām pramada bhara śālī dhvaniḥ abhūt
nidhāya aṅke paṅkeruha dala viṭaṅkasya lalitā
tatas rādhām nīrāharaṇa saraṇau nyasta caraṇā
milantam kālindī pulina bhuvi khelā āñcita gatim
dadarśa agre kaṃcid madhura virutam śvetagarutam
tad āloka stoka ucchvasita hṛdayā sādaram asau

original: praṇāmaṃ śaṃsantī laghu laghu samāsādya savidham /
analyzed: praṇāmam śaṃsantī laghu laghu samāsādya savidham
dhṛta utkaṇṭhā sadyas hari sadasi sandeśa haraṇe

original: varaṃ dūtaṃ mene tamatilalitaṃ hanta lalitā //7
analyzed: varam dūtam mene tam ati lalitam hanta lalitā
amarṣāt prema īrṣyām sapadi dadhatī kaṃsa mathane
pravṛttā haṃsāya svam abhilaṣitam śaṃsitum asau

original: na tasyā doṣo.ayaṃ yadiha vihagaṃ prārthitavatī
analyzed: na tasyāḥ doṣaḥ ayam yat iha vihagam prārthitavatī
na kasmin viśrambham diśati hari bhakti praṇayi tā
pavitreṣu prāyas viracayasi toyeṣu vasatim
pramodam na alīke vahasi viśada ātmā svayam asi
tatas aham duḥkha ārtā śaraṇam abalā tvām gatavatī

original: na yācñā satpakṣe vrajati hi kadācidviphalatām //9
analyzed: na yācñā sat pakṣe vrajati hi kadācid viphala tām
ciram vismṛtya asmān viraha dahana jvāla vikalāḥ
kalāvān sa ānandam vasati mukharāyām madhuripuḥ
tat etam sandeśam sva manasi svam ādhāya nikhilam
bhavān kṣipram tasya śaraṇa padavīm saṅgamayatu
nirasta pratyūham bhavatu bhavataḥ vartmani śivam
samuttiṣṭha kṣipram manasi mudam ādhāya sa daram
adhastāt dhāvantaḥ laghu laghu samuttāna nayanaiḥ
bhavantam vīkṣantām kutuka taralāḥ gopa śiśavaḥ
sa vaidagdhī sindhuḥ kaṭhina matinā dānapatinā
yayā ninye tūrṇam paśupa yuvatī jīvana patiḥ
tayā gantavyā te nikhila jagat eka prathitayā
padavyā bhavyānām tilaka kila dāśārha nagarī
galat bāṣpa asāra pluta dhavala gaṇḍāḥ mṛga dṛśaḥ
vidūyante yatra pramada madana āveśa vivaśāḥ
tvayā vijñātavyāḥ hari caraṇa saṅga praṇayinaḥ
dhruvam sā cakrāṅkīrati sakha śatāṅgasya padavī
piban jambū śyāmam mihira duhituḥ vāri madhuram
mṛṇālīḥ bhuñjānaḥ himakara kaṇā komala rucaḥ
kṣaṇam hṛṣṭaḥ tiṣṭhan nibiḍa viṭape śākhini sakhe
sukhena prasthānam racayatu bhavān vṛṣṇi nagare
balāt ākrandantī rata pathikam akrūra militam
vidūrāt ābhīrī tatiḥ anuyayau yena ramaṇam

original: tamādau panthānaṃ racaya caritārthā bhavatu te
analyzed: tam ādau panthānam racaya caritārthā bhavatu te
virājantī sarva upari paramahaṃsa sthitiḥ iyam
akasmāt asmākam hariḥ apaharan aṃśuka cayam
yam ārūḍhaḥ gūḍha praṇaya laharīm kandalayitum
tava a śrāntasya antar sthagita ravi bimbaḥ kisalayaiḥ
kadambaḥ kādamba tvaritam avalambaḥ sa bhavitā
kirantī lāvaṇyam diśi diśi śikhaṇḍa stavakinī
dadhānā sādhīyaḥ kanaka vimala jyotiḥ vasanam
tamāla śyāma aṅgī sarala muralī cumbita mukhī
jagau citram yatra prakaṭa parama ānanda laharī
tayā bhūyas krīḍā rabhasa vikasat vallava vadhūḥ
vapuḥ vallī bhraśyat mṛgamada kaṇa śyāmalikayā
vidhātavyaḥ hallīsaka dalita malla latikayā
samantāt ullāsaḥ tava manasi rāsasthalikayā
tad ante vāsantī viracita manaṅga utsava kalā

original: catuḥśālaṃ śaureḥ sphurati na dṛśau tatra vikireḥ /
analyzed: catuḥśālam śaureḥ sphurati na dṛśau tatra vikireḥ
tad āloka udbhedi pramada bhava vismārita gati

original: kriye jāte tāvat tvayi bata hatā gopavanitā //19
analyzed: kriye jāte tāvat tvayi bata hatā gopa vanitā
mama syāt arthānām kṣatiḥ iha vilambāt yat api te
sarvam tat api hari keli sthalam idam

original: taveyaṃ vyarthā bhavatu śucitā kaḥ sa hi sakhe
analyzed: tava iyam vyarthā bhavatu śuci tā kaḥ sa hi sakhe
guṇaḥ yaḥ cāṇūra dviṣi mati niveśāya na bhavet
sakṛt vaṃśī nāda śravaṇa milita ābhīḥ vanitā
sa dhenūnām bandhuḥ madhu mathana khaṭṭāyita śilaḥ
kariṣyati ānandam sapadi tava govardhana giriḥ
tam eva adrim cakra aṅkita kara pariṣvaṅgi rasikam
mahī cakre śaṅkemahi śikhariṇām śekhara tayā

original: arātiṃ jñātīnāṃ nanu hariharaṃ yaḥ paribhavan
analyzed: arātim jñātīnām nanu hari haram yaḥ paribhavan

original: yathārthaṃ svaṃ nāma vyadhita govardhana iti //22
analyzed: yathārtham svam nāma vyadhita govardhanaḥ iti
tamālasya ālokāt giri parisare santi capalāḥ
pulindyaḥ govinda smaraṇa rabhasa uttapta vapuṣaḥ

original: śanais tāsāṃ tāpaṃ kṣaṇam apanayan yāsyati bhavān
analyzed: śanais tāsām tāpam kṣaṇam apanayan yāsyati bhavān
avaśyam kālindī salila śiśiraiḥ pakṣa pavanaiḥ
tad ante śrī kānta smaraṇa samara ghāṭī pulakitā
kadambānām vāṭī rasika paripāṭī sphurayati

original: tvamāsīnastasyāṃ na yadi parito nandasi tato
analyzed: tvam āsīnaḥ tasyām na yadi paritas nandasi
babhūva vyarthā te ghana rasa nivāsa vyasani tā
śarad megha śreṇī pratibhaṭam ariṣṭa asura śiraḥ
ciram śuṣkam vṛndāvana parisare drakṣyati bhavān
yadā āroḍhum dūrāt milati kila kailāsa śikhari
bhrama ākrānta svāntaḥ giriśa suhṛdaḥ kiṅkara gaṇaḥ
ruvan yāhi svairam carama daśayā cumbita rucaḥ
nitambinyaḥ vṛndāvana bhuvi sakhe santi bahavaḥ
parāvartiṣyante tulita murajit nūpura ravāt
tava adhvānāt tāsām bahis api gatāḥ kṣipram asavaḥ
tvam āsīnaḥ śākhā antara milita caṇḍa tviṣi sukham
dadhīthāḥ bhāṇḍīre kṣaṇam api ghana śyāmala rucau
tatas haṃsam bibhran nikhila nabhasaḥ citra miṣayā
sa vardhiṣṇum viṣṇum kalita dara cakram tulayitā
tvam aṣṭābhiḥ netraiḥ vigalat amala prema salilaiḥ
muhur sikta stambām catur āsya sthiti bhuvam
jihīthāḥ vikhyātām sphutam iha bhavat bāndhava ratham
praviṣṭam maṃsyante vidhim aṭavī devyaḥ tvayi gate
udañcat netra ambhaḥ prasara laharī picchila patha
skhalat pādanyāsa praṇihita vilamba ākula dhiyaḥ
harau yasmin magne tvarita yamunā kula gamana
spṛhā kṣiptāḥ gopyaḥ yayuḥ anupadam kām api daśām
vikāśena bhraṣṭaiḥ phaṇi maṇi kulaiḥ dhūmala rucau
puras tasmin nīpa druma kusuma kiñjalka surabhau
tvayā puṇye peyam madhuram udakam kāliya hrade
tṛṇāvarta arāteḥ viraha dava santāpita tanoḥ
vidhātavyaḥ navya stavaka bhara saṃvardhita śucaḥ
tvayā vṛndā devyāḥ parama vinayāt vandana vidhiḥ
iti krāntvā kekā kṛta virutam ekādaśa vanam
ghanībhūtam cutaiḥ vraja madhuvanam dvādaśam idam
purī yasmin āste yadu kula bhuvām nirmaya yaśaḥ
bharāṇām dhārābhiḥ valita dharitrī parisarā
niketaiḥ ākīrṇāḥ giriśa giri ḍimbha pratibhaṭaiḥ
avaṣṭambha stambha āvali vilasitaiḥ puṣpita vanā
niviṣṭā kālindī taṭa bhuvi sakhe
vṛṣaḥ śambhoḥ yasyām daśati navam ekatra yavasam
viriñceḥ anyasmin gilati kalahaṃsaḥ visala tām
kvacid kroñca arāteḥ kavalayati kekī viṣadharam
vilīḍhe śallakyā vala ripu karī pallava mitaḥ

original: arodhiṣṭhāḥ kāyān na hi vicalitāṃ pracchadapaṭīṃ
analyzed: arodhiṣṭhāḥ kāyāt na hi vicalitām pracchada paṭīm
vimuktām ajñāsīḥ pathi pathi na muktā āvalim api
ayi śrī govinda smaraṇa madirā matta hṛdaye
satī iti khyātiḥ te hasati kulaṭānām kulam idam
asavyam bibhrāṇā padam adhūta lākṣā rasam asau

original: prayātāhaṃ mugdhe virama mama veśaiḥ kimadhunā /
analyzed: prayātā aham mugdhe virama mama veśaiḥ kim adhunā
amandāt āśaṅke sakhi pura purandhri kalakalāt
alinda agre vṛndāvana kusumadhanvā vijayate
ayam līlā apāṅga snapita pura vīthī parisaraḥ
nava aśoka uttaṃsaḥ calati puratas kaṃsa vijayī
kim asmān etasmin maṇi bhavana pṛṣṭhāt vinudatī
tvam ekā stabdha akṣī sthagayasi gavākṣa āvalim api

original: muhuḥ śūnyāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ vahasi dhyāyasi sadā
analyzed: muhur śūnyām dṛṣṭim vahasi dhyāyasi sadā
śṛṇoṣi pratyakṣam nava parijana vijñāpana śatam
tatas śaṅke paṅkeruha mukhi yayau śyāmala ruciḥ
sa yūnaḥ mūrtam sambhava nayana vīthī pathika tām

original: vilajjaṃ mā rodīriha sakhi punaryāsyati hari-
analyzed: vilajjam mā rodīḥ iha sakhi punar yāsyati hari
stava apaṅga krīḍā nibiḍa paricaryā grahi latām

original: iti svairaṃ yasyāṃ pathi pathi murārerabhinava-
analyzed: iti svairam yasyām pathi pathi murāreḥ abhinava
praveśe nārīṇām rati rabhasa jalpāḥ vavṛdhire
sakhe sākṣāt dāmodara vadana candra avakalana
sphurat prema ānanda prakara laharī cumbita dhiyaḥ
muhur atra ābhīrī samudaya śiraḥ nyasta vipada
stava akṣṇoḥ ānandam vidadhīta purā paura vanitāḥ
atha bhrāmam bhrāmam krama ghaṭanayā saṅkaṭatarān
nivāsān vṛṣṇīnām anusara
murārāteḥ yatra sthagita gagaṇābhiḥ vijayate
patābhiḥ santāpita bhuvanam antaḥpura varam
yad utsaṅge tuṅga sphaṭika racitāḥ santi
suhṛd buddhyā haṃsāḥ kalita madhurasya ambuja bhuvaḥ
sa maryādam yeṣām sapadi paricaryām vidadhīta
cirāt paśupa ramaṇīnām api kulaiḥ
alabdham kālindī pulina vipine līna maṇḍitaḥ
sadā loka ullāsi smita paricita āsyam sahacari
sphurantam vīkṣiṣye punar api kim agre murabhidam
viṣādam mā kārṣīt rutim avitattha vyāhṛtiḥ asau
samāgantā rādhe dhṛta nava śikhaṇḍaḥ tava sakhā
iti brūte yasyām śuka mithunam indrānuja kṛte
yadā ābhīri vṛndaiḥ upadhṛtam abhūt uddhava kare
ghana śyāmā bhrāmyati upari hariharmasya śikhibhiḥ
kṛta stotrā mugdhaiḥ aguru racitā dhūmalatikā
tad ālokāt dhīra sphurati tava ced mānasa ruciḥ
jitam tarhi svairam jalasaha nivāsa priya tayā
tatas madhye kakṣam prati nava gavākṣa stavakinam
calat muktā lamba sphuritam amala stambha nivaham
bhavān draṣṭā
llasat bhitti prāntam muravijayinaḥ keli nilayam
alinde yasya āste marakata mayī yaṣṭiḥ amalā
śayāluḥ yām rātrau mada kala kalāpī kalayati
nirāṭaṅkaḥ tsyāḥ śikharam adhiruhya śrama nudam
pratīkṣethāḥ bhrātar varam avasaram yādava pateḥ
niviṣṭaḥ palāṅke mṛdulatara tulī dhavalite
tri loka lakṣmīṇām kakudi dara sātīkṛta tanūḥ
amandam pūrṇa indu pratimam upadhānam
nidhāya agre tasmin upahita kaphoni dvaya bharam
udañcat kālindī salila subhagam bhāvuka ruciḥ
kapola antar prekṣyat maṇi makara mudrā madhurimā
vasānaḥ kauśeyam jita kanaka lakṣmī parimalam
mukundaḥ te sākṣāt pramada sudhayā sekṣyati dṛśoḥ
vikadruḥ paurāṇīḥ akhila kula vṛddhaḥ yadupateḥ
adūrāt āsīnaḥ madhura bhanitīḥ gāsyati sadā
purastāt ābhīrī gaṇa bhaya da nāmā sa kaṭhinaḥ
maṇi stambha ālambī kuru kula kathām saṅkalayitā
śinīnām uttaṃsaḥ kalita kṛta varmā api ubhayatas
praṇeṣyate bāla vyajana yugala āndolana vidhim
sa jānubhyām aṣṭāpada bhuvanam avaṣṭabhya bhavitā
guroḥ śiṣyaḥ nūnam pada kamala saṃvāhana rataḥ
vihaṅga indraḥ yugmīkṛta kara sarojaḥ bhuvi puras
kṛta āsaṅgaḥ bhāvī prajavini nirdeśe arpita manāḥ
chada dvandve yasya dhvanati mathurā vāsi baṭavaḥ
vyadasyante sāma svara janitam anyonya kalaham
na nirvaktum dāmodara pada kaniṣṭhā aṅguli nakha
dyutīnām lāvaṇyam bhavati catur āsyaḥ api caturaḥ
tathā api strī prajñā sulabha tarala tvāt aham asau
pravṛttā tad mūrti stava rati mahāsāhasa vaśe
virājante yasya vraja śiśu kula steya vikala
svayambhū cūḍā agraiḥ lulita śikharāḥ pāda nakharāḥ
kṣaṇam yān ālokya prakaṭa paramānanda vivaśaḥ

original: sa devarṣirmuktān api tanubhṛtaḥ śocati bhṛśam //54
analyzed: sa devarṣiḥ muktān api tanubhṛtaḥ śocati bhṛśam
sarojānām vyūhaḥ śriyam abhilaṣan yasya
ryayau rāgāḍhyānām vidhuram uda vāsa vrata vidhim
himam vande nīcaiḥ anucita vidhāna vyasaninām
yat eṣām prāṇa antam damanam anu varṣam praṇayati
rucīnam ullāsaiḥ marakata maya sthūla kadalī
kadamba ahaṃkāram kavalayati yasya ūru yugalam
yad ālāna stambha dyūutim avalalambe kalavatām
madāt uddāmānām paśupa ramaṇī citta kariṇīm
sakhe yasya ābhīrī nayana sapharī jīvana vidhau
nidānam gāmbhīrya prasara kalitā nābhi sarasī
yatas kalpasya ādau sa jala janaka utpatti vaḍabhī
gabhīra antar kakṣa dhṛta bhuvanam ambhoruham abhūt
dyutim dhatte yasya trivali latikā saṅkaṭataram
sakhe dāma śreṇī kṣapaṇa racanā abhijñam udaram
yaśodā yasya antar sura nara bhujaṅgaiḥ parivṛtam
mukha dvārā vāra dvayam avaluloke tribhuvanam
urau yasya sphāram sphurati vana mālā valayitam
vitanvānam tanvī jana manasi sadyas manasijam
marīcībhiḥ yasmin ravi nivaha tulyaḥ api vahate
sadā khadyota ābhām bhuvana madhuraḥ kaustubha maṇiḥ
samantāt unmīlat vala bhid upala stambha yugala
prabhā jaitram keśi dvija dalita keyūra lalitam
bhuja dvandva
yasya sphuṭa surabhi gandham vijayate
jihīte sāmrājyam jagati nava lāvaṇya laharī
parīpākasya antar mudita madanā veśa madhuram
naṭat bhrū vallīkam smita nava sudhā keli sadanam
sphurat muktā paṅkti pratima radanam yasya vadanam
kim ebhiḥ vyāhāraiḥ kalaya kathayāmi sphuṭam aham
sakhe niḥsandeham paricaya padam kevalam idam
parānandaḥ yasmin nayana padavī bhrāji bhavitā
tvayā vijñātavyā madhura rava saḥ ayam madhuripuḥ
kṛṣṇaḥ
vimugdha vyāmugdham yadi puravadhū vibhrama bharaiḥ

original: tadā nāsmān grāmyāḥ pravaṇapadavīṃ tasya gamayeḥ
analyzed: tadā na asmān grāmyāḥ pravaṇa padavīm tasya gamayeḥ

original: sudhāpūrṇaṃ cetaḥ kathamapi na takraṃ mṛgayate //63
analyzed: sudhā pūrṇam cetaḥ katham api na takram mṛgayate
yadā vṛndāraṇya smaraṇa laharī hetu ramaṇam
pikānām veveṣṭi pratiharitam uccais kuhu rutam
vahante vā vātāḥ sphurati giri mallī parimalā
stadā eva āsmākīnām giram upaharethāḥ murabhidi
purā atiṣṭhan goṣṭhāt nikhila ramaṇībhyaḥ priya tayā
bhavān yasyām gopī ramaṇa vidadhe gaurava bharam
sakhī tasyāḥ vijñāpayati lalitā dhīra lalita
praṇamya śrī pāda ambuja kanaka pīṭhī parisare
prayatnāt ābālyam nava kamalinī pallava kulaiḥ
s tvayā bhūyas yasyāḥ kṛtam ahaha saṃvardhanam abhūt
cirāt ūdhobhāram sphuraṇa param ākrānta jaghanā
babhūva praṣṭhauhī mura mathana sā iyam kapalikā
samīpe nīpānām tri catur adalā hanta gamitā
tvayā yā mākanda priya sahacarī bhāva niyatim
iyam sā vāsantī galat amala mādhvīka paṭalī
miṣāt agre gopī ramaṇa rudatī rodayatī naḥ

original: prasūto devakyā madhumathana yaḥ ko.api puruṣaḥ
analyzed: prasūtaḥ devakyā madhu mathana yaḥ kaḥ api puruṣaḥ
sa yātaḥ gopāla abhyudaya parama ānanda vasatim

original: dhṛto yo gāndhinyā kaṭhinajaṭhare samprati tataḥ
analyzed: dhṛtaḥ yaḥ gāndhinyā kaṭhina jaṭhare samprati tatas
samantāt eva astam śiva śiva gatā go kula kathā
ariṣṭena uddhatāḥ paśupa sudṛśaḥ yāti vipadam
tṛṇa āvarta ākrāntaḥ racayati bhayam catvara cayaḥ
amī vyomībhūtāḥ vraja vasati bhūmī parisarā

original: vahante santāpaṃ murahara vidūraṃ tvayi gate //69
analyzed: vahante santāpam mura hara vidūram tvayi gate
tvayā nā āgantavyam katham api hare goṣṭham adhunā
latā śreṇī vṛndāvana bhuvi yatas abhūt viṣa mayī
prasūnānām gandham madhumathana tadā vāta nihitam

original: bhajan sadyo mūrcchāṃ vahati nivaho gopasudṛśām //70
analyzed: bhajan sadyas mūrcchām vahati nivahaḥ gopa sudṛśām

original: kathaṃ saṅgo.asmābhiḥ saha samucitaḥ samprati hare-
analyzed: katham saṅgaḥ asmābhiḥ saha samucitaḥ samprati hare
rayam grāmyāḥ nāryaḥ tvam asi nṛpa kanyā arcita padaḥ
gataḥ kālaḥ yasmin paśupa ramaṇī saṅgam akṛte
bhavān vyagraḥ tasthau tamasi gṛha vāṭi viṭapini

original: vayaṃ tyaktāḥ svāmin yadi tava kiṃ dūṣaṇamidaṃ
analyzed: vayam tyaktāḥ svāmin yadi tava kim dūṣaṇam idam
nisargaḥ śyāmānām ayam atitarām duṣpariharaḥ
kuhūkaṇṭha eraṇḍa avadhi saha nivāsāt paricitā
visṛjyante sadyas kalita nava pakṣaiḥ valibhujaḥ

original: ayaṃ pūrvo raṅgaḥ kila paricito yasya tarasā
analyzed: ayam pūrvaḥ raṅgaḥ kila paricitaḥ yasya tarasā
rasāt ākhyātavyam parikalaya tat nāṭakam idam
mayā praṣṭavyā asi prathamam iti vṛndāvana pate
kim āha ā rādhā iti smarasi hatakam varṇa yugalam
aye kuñja droṇī kuhara gṛhamedhin kim adhunā
parokṣam vakṣyante paśupa ramaṇī durniyatayaḥ
pravīṇā gopīnām tava caraṇa padme api yat iyam
yayau rādhā sādhāraṇa samucita praśna padavīm
tvayā goṣṭham goṣṭhī tilaka kila ced vismṛtam idam

original: na tūrṇaṃ dhūmorṇāpatirapi vidhatte yadi kṛpām /
analyzed: na tūrṇam dhūmorṇā patiḥ api vidhatte yadi kṛpām
ahar vṛndam vṛndāvana kusuma pālī parimalaiḥ
dara ālokam śoka āspadam iva katham na iṣyati sakhī
taraṅgaiḥ kurvāṇā śamana bhaginī lāghavam asau
nadīm kāṃcid goṣṭhe nayana jalapūraiḥ ajanayat
iti iva asyāḥ dveṣāt abhimata daśā prārthana mayīm

original: murāre vijñaptiṃ niśamayati mānī na śamanaḥ //76
analyzed: murāre vijñaptim niśamayati mānī na śamanaḥ

original: kṛtākṛṣṭikrīḍaṃ kimapi tava rūpaṃ mama sakhī
analyzed: kṛta ākṛṣṭi krīḍam kim api tava rūpam mama sakhī
sakṛt dṛṣṭvā dūrāt ahita hita bodha ujjhita matiḥ
hatā sā iyam prema analam anu viśantī sarabhasam
pataṅgī iva ātmānam mura hara muhur dāhitavatī

original: mayā vācyaḥ kiṃ vā tvamiha nijadoṣāt paramasau
analyzed: mayā vācyaḥ kim vā tvam iha nija doṣāt param asau
yayau mandā vṛndāvana kusuma bandho vidhura tām
yad artham duḥkha agniḥ vikṛśati tam adya api hṛdayān
na yasmāt durmedhāḥ lavam api bhavantam davayati

original: trivakrāho dhanyā hṛdayamiva te svaṃ puramasau
analyzed: trivakrā aho dhanyā hṛdayam iva te svam puram asau
samāsādya svairam yat iha vilasantī nivasati
dhruvam puṇya bhraṃśāt ajani saralā iyam mama sakhī
praveśaḥ tatra abhūt kṣaṇam api yat asyāḥ na sulabhaḥ
kim āviṣṭā bhūtaiḥ sapadi yadi vā akrūra phaṇinā
kṣata apasmāreṇa cyuta matiḥ akasmāt kim apatat
iti vyagraiḥ asyām gurubhiḥ abhitas kīcakarava
śravāt aspandāyām mura hara vikalpāḥ vidadhire
navīnā iyam samprati akuśala parīpāka laharī
nirīṇarti svairam mama sahacarī citta kuhare
jagat netra śreṇī madhura mathurāyām nivasata

original: ścirādārtā vārtāmapi tava yadeṣā na labhate //81
analyzed: ścirāt ārtā vārtām api tava yat eṣā na labhate
janān siddhādaśān namati bhajate māntrika gaṇān
vidhatte śuśrūṣām adhika vinayena auṣadha vidām
tvad īkṣā dīkṣāyai paricarati bhaktyā girisutām

original: manīṣā hi vyagrā kimapi śubhahetuṃ na manute //82
analyzed: manīṣā hi vyagrā kim api śubha hetum na manute
paśūnām pātāram bhujaga ripu putra praṇayinam
sadā abhyarṇe nandīśvara giribhuvaḥ raṅga rasikam

original: bhavantaṃ kaṃsāre bhajati bhavadāptyai mama sakhī //83
analyzed: bhavantam kaṃsāre bhajati bhavat āptyai mama sakhī
bhavantam santaptā vidalita tamāla aṅkura rasaiḥ
r vilikhya bhrū bhaṅgī kṛta madana kodaṇḍa kadanam
nidhāsayantī kaṇṭhe tava nija bhujāḥ vallarīm asau
viluṭhati
kadācid mūḍhā iyam nibiḍa bhavadīya smṛtimadā
damandāt ātmānam kalayati bhavantam mama sakhī
tathā asyāḥ rādhāyāḥ viraha dahana a kalpita dhiyaḥ

original: murāre duḥsādhyā kṣaṇamapi na bādhā viramati //85
analyzed: murāre duḥsādhyā kṣaṇam api na bādhā viramati
tvayā santāpānām upari parimuktā ati rabhasā
didānīm āpede tat api tava ceṣṭām priya sakhī
yat eṣā kaṃsāre bhidura hṛdayam tvām avayati
satīnām mūrdhanyā bhidura hṛdayā abhūt anudinam
samakṣam sarveṣām viharasi mad ādhi praṇayinām
iti śrutvā nūnam gurutara samādhim kalayati
sadā kaṃsa arāte bhajasi yaminām netra padavīm
iti vyaktam sajjībhavati yamam ālocitum api
murāre kālindī salila dalat indīvara ruce
vraja ānandin nandīśvara dayita nandātmaja hare
sadā iti krandantī parijana śucam kandalayati
samantāt uttaptaḥ tava viraha dāva agni śikharayā
kṛta udvegaḥ pañca āśuga mṛgayu vedha vyatikaraiḥ
tanūbhūtam sadyas tanu vanam idam hāsyati hare
haṭhāt adya śvas vā mama sahacarī prāṇa hariṇaḥ
payaḥ rāśi sphīta tviṣi himakara uttaṃsa madhure
dadhāne dṛś bhaṅgyā smara vijayi rūpam mama sakhī

original: hare dattasvāntā bhavati tadimāṃ kiṃ prabhavati
analyzed: hare datta svāntā bhavati tat imām kim prabhavati

original: smaro hantuṃ kintu vyathayati bhavān eva kutukī //90
analyzed: smaraḥ hantum kintu vyathayati bhavān eva kutukī
vijānīme bhāvam paśupa ramaṇīnām yadu maṇe

original: na jānīmaḥ kasmāt tadapi tava māyā racayati /
analyzed: na jānīmaḥ kasmāt tat api tava māyā racayati
samantāt adhyātmam yat iha pavana vyādheḥ alapa
dbalāt asyāḥ tena vyasana kulam eva dvi guṇitam
guroḥ antevāsī sa bhajati yadūnām sacivatām

original: sakhīyaṃ kālindī kila bhavati kālasya bhaginī /
analyzed: sakhī iyam kālindī kila bhavati kālasya bhaginī
bhavet anyaḥ kaḥ vā narapati pure mad paricito
daśām asyāḥ śaṃsan yadu tilaka yaḥ tvām anunayet
viśīrṇa aṅgīm antar vraṇa viluṭhanāt utkalikayā
parītām bhūyasyā satatam uparāga vyatikarām
paridhvasta āmodām viramita samasta ali kutukām
vidho pāda sparśāt api sukhaya rādhā kumudinīm
vipattibhyaḥ prāṇān katham api bhavat saṅgam asukha
spṛhā adhīnā śaure mama sahacarī rakṣitavatī
atikrānte samprati avadhi divase jīvana vidhau
hata āśā niḥśaṅkam vitarati dṛśau cuta mukule
pratīkāra ārambha ślatha matibhiḥ udyat pariṇate
rvimuktāyāḥ vyakta smara kadana bhājaḥ parijanaiḥ
a muñcantī saṅgam kuvalayadṛśaḥ kevalam asau
kalāt adya prāṇān avati bhava āśā sahacarī
aye rāsakrīḍā rasika mama sakhyām nava navā

original: purā baddhā yena praṇayalaharī hanta gahanā /
analyzed: purā baddhā yena praṇaya laharī hanta gahanā

original: sa cen muktāpekṣastvamapi dhig imāṃ tulaśakalaṃ
analyzed: sa ced mukta apekṣaḥ tvam api dhik imām tulaśa kalam
yat etasyāḥ nāsā nihitam idam adyā api calati
mukunda bhrānta akṣī kim api yat asaṃkalpita śatam

original: vidhatte tadvaktuṃ jagati manujaḥ kaḥ prabhavati /
analyzed: vidhatte tat vaktum jagati manujaḥ kaḥ prabhavati
kadācid kalyāṇī vilapati yaḥ utkaṇṭhita mati
stadā ākhyāmi svāmin gamaya makara uttaṃsa padavīm

original: abhūt ko.api premā mayi murariporyaḥ sakhi purā
analyzed: abhūt kaḥ api premā mayi muraripoḥ yaḥ sakhi purā
parām karma apekṣām api tad avalambāt na gaṇayet

original: tathedānīṃ hā dhik samajani taṭasthaḥ sphuṭamahaṃ
analyzed: tathā idānīm hā dhik samajani taṭa sthaḥ sphuṭam aham
bhaje lajjām yena kṣaṇam api punar jīvitum api

original: garīyān me premā tvayi paramiti snehalaghutā
analyzed: garīyān me premā tvayi param iti sneha laghu tā
na jīviṣyāmi iti praṇaya garima khyāpana vidhiḥ
katham na ayāsi iti smaraṇa paripāṭī prakaṭanam

original: harau sandeśāya priyasakhi na me vāgavasaraḥ //99
analyzed: harau sandeśāya priya sakhi na me vāc avasaraḥ

original: amī kuñjaḥ pūrvaṃ na mama dadhire kāmapi mudaṃ
analyzed: amī kuñjaḥ pūrvam na mama dadhire kām api mudam

original: drumālīyaṃ cetaḥ sakhi na katiśo nanditavatī /
analyzed: dru mālīyam cetaḥ sakhi na katiśas
idānīm paśya ete vidadhate

original: prabho muktopekṣe bhajati na hi ko vā vimukhatām //100
analyzed: prabho mukta upekṣe bhajati na hi kaḥ vā vimukha tām
kadā prema unmīlat madana madirā akṣī samudayāt
balāt ākarṣantam madhura muralī kākalikayā
muhur bhrāmyat cillī culukita kula strī vratam aham
vilokā iyam līlā mada milat apāṅgī murabhidam
yayau kālaḥ kalyāṇī adhi kalita kelī parimalām
vilāsa arthī yasmin acala kuhare līna vapuṣam

original: sa māṃ dhṛtvā dhūrtaḥ kṛtakapaṭaroṣāṃ sakhi haṭhā-
analyzed: sa mām dhṛtvā dhūrtaḥ kṛta kapaṭa roṣām sakhi haṭhā
dakārṣīt ākarṣan urasi śaśi lekhā śata vṛtām
rāṇat bhṛṅga śreṇī suhṛdi śarad ārambha madhure
vanānte cāndrībhiḥ kiraṇa laharībhiḥ dhavalite
kadā prema uddaṇḍa smara kalaha vaitaṇḍikam aham
kariṣye govindam nibiḍa bhuja bandha praṇayinam

original: mano me hā kaṣṭaṃ jvalati kimahaṃ hanta karavai
analyzed: manaḥ me hā kaṣṭam jvalati kim aham hanta karavai

original: na pāraṃ nāvāraṃ kimapi kalayāmy asya jaladheḥ /
analyzed: na pāram na avāram kim api kalayāmi asya jaladheḥ

original: iyaṃ vande mūrdhnā sapadi tamupāyaṃ kathaya māṃ
analyzed: iyam vande mūrdhnā sapadi tam upāyam kathaya mām
patām ṛṣye yasmāt hṛti kaṇikayā āpe kṣaṇikayā
prayātaḥ mām hitvā yadi kaṭhina cūḍāmaṇiḥ asau

original: paryātu svacchandaṃ mama samayadharmaḥ kila gatiḥ /
analyzed: paryātu svacchandam mama samaya dharmaḥ kila gatiḥ

original: idaṃ soḍhuṃ kā vā prabhavati yataḥ svapnakapaṭā-
analyzed: idam soḍhum kā vā prabhavati yatas svapna kapaṭā
dihā āyātaḥ vṛndāvana bhuvi kalān mām ramayati

original: anaucityaṃ tasya vyathayati mano hanta mathurāṃ
analyzed: anaucityam tasya vyathayati manaḥ hanta mathurām
tvam āsādya svairam capala hṛdayam vāraya harim

original: sakhi svapnārambhe punarapi yathā vibhrama madā-
analyzed: sakhi svapna ārambhe punar api yathā vibhrama madā

original: dihāyāto dhūrtaḥ kṣapayati na me kiṅkiniguṇam //106
analyzed: diha āyātaḥ dhūrtaḥ kṣapayati na me kiṅkini guṇam

original: ayi svapno dūre viramatu samakṣaṃ śṛṇu haṭhā-
analyzed: ayi svapnaḥ dūre viramatu samakṣam śṛṇu haṭhā
mā bhūḥ iha sakhi manaḥ vibhrama dhiyā
vayasyaḥ te govardhana vipinam āsādya kutukā
da kāṇḍe yat bhūyas smara kalaha pāṇḍityam atanot
amarṣāt dhāvantīm gahana kuhare sūcita pathām
tulā koṭi kvānaiḥ cakita pada pāta dvi guṇitaiḥ
vidhīrṣan mām harṣa uttarala nayana antaḥ sa kutukī
na vaṃśīm ajñāsīt bhuvi kara sarojāt vigalitām
aśaktām gantavye kalita nava cela añcala tayā
latā ālībhiḥ puṣpa smita śavalitābhiḥ virudatīm
parīhāsa ārambhī priya sakhi sa mām lambita mukhīm
prapede cumbāya sphurat adhara bimbaḥ tava sakhā
tatas aham dhammille sthagita muralīkā sakhi śanais
ralīka amarṣeṇa bhramat avirala bhrūḥ udacalam
kaca ākṛṣṭi krīḍā krama paricite caurya carite
hariḥ labdha upādhiḥ prasabham anayat mām giri darīm
kadācid vāsantī kuhara bhuvi dhṛṣṭaḥ sa rabhasam

original: hasan pṛṣṭhālambī sthagayati karābhyāṃ mama dṛśau /
analyzed: hasan pṛṣṭha ālambī sthagayati karābhyām mama dṛśau
didhīrṣau jāta īrṣyam mayi sakhi tadīya aṅguli śikhām

original: na jāne kutrāyaṃ vrajati kitavānāṃ kila guruḥ //111
analyzed: na jāne kutra ayam vrajati kitavānām kila guruḥ

original: atīteyaṃ vārtā viramatu puraḥ paśya sarale
analyzed: atītā iyam vārtā viramatu puras paśya sarale
vayasyaḥ te saḥ ayam smita madhurima unmṛṣṭa vadanaḥ
bhuja stambha ullāsāt abhimata parīrambha rabhasaḥ
smara krīḍā sindhuḥ kṣipati mayi bandhuka kusumam
tat uttiṣṭha vrīḍāvati nibiḍa muktā latikayā

original: vadhānemaṃ dhūrtaṃ sakhi madhupurīṃ yāti na yathā /
analyzed: vadhāna imam dhūrtam sakhi madhupurīm yāti na yathā
iti prema unmīlat bhavat anubhava ārūḍha jaḍimā
sakhīnām ākrandam na kila katiśas kandalayati
aho kaṣṭam bālyāt aham iha sakhīm duṣṭa hṛdayā
muhur māna granthim sahaja saralām grāhitavatī
tad ārambhāt gopī gaṇa rati guro nirbharam asau
na lebhe lubdhā api tvad amala bhuja stambha rabhasam
alinde kālindī kamala surabhau kuñja vasate
rvasantīm vāsantī nava parimala udgāri cikurām
tvad utsaṅge nidrā sukha mukulita akṣīm punar imām
kadā aham seviṣye kiśalaya kalāpa vyajaninī
dhṛta ānandām vṛndāvana parisare śārada niśā
vilāsa ullāsena glapita kavarī phulla kusumām
tava skandha upānte vinihita bhujā vallarim aham

original: kadā kuñje līnā rahasi vihasiṣyāmi sumukhīm //116
analyzed: kadā kuñje līnā rahasi vihasiṣyāmi su mukhīm
vidūrāt āhartum kusumam upayāmi tvam adhunā
puras tīre tīre kalaya tulasī pallavam idam
iti vyājāt enām vidita bhavadīya sthitiḥ aham
kadā kuñje gopī ramaṇa gamayiṣyāmi samaye
iti śrī kaṃsāreḥ pada kamalayoḥ gokula kathām
nivedya pratyekam bhaja parijaneṣu praṇayi tām
nija aṅke kādambī sahacara vahan maṇḍana tayā
na yān uccais prema pravaṇam anujagrāha bhagavān
milat bhaṅgīm haṃsī ramaṇa vanamālām

original: mudā kṣemaṃ pṛcchann idamupaharethā mama vacaḥ /
analyzed: mudā kṣemam pṛcchan idam upaharethāḥ mama vacaḥ
ciram kaṃsa arāteḥ urasi sahavāsa praṇayinīm
kim enām enā akṣīm guṇavati visasmāra bhavatī

original: idaṃ kiṃ vā hanta smarasi rasike khaṇḍanaruṣā
analyzed: idam kim vā hanta smarasi rasike khaṇḍana ruṣā
parīta aṅgī govardhana giri nitambe mama sakhī

original: bhiyā sambhrāntākṣaṃ yadiha vicakarṣa tvayi balā-
analyzed: bhiyā sambhrānta akṣam yat iha vicakarṣa tvayi balā
dgṛhītvā vibhraśyan nava śikhi śikham gokula patim
tatas sambhāṣethāḥ śruti makara mudrām iti mudā
bhavatyām kartavyaḥ kim iti kuśala praśna jaḍimā

original: rucismerā yā tvaṃ racayasi sadā cumbanakalām
analyzed: ruci smerā yā tvam racayasi sadā cumbana kalām
apāṅgena spṛṣṭā sakhi muraripoḥ gaṇḍa mukure
nivāsaḥ te devi śravaṇa latikāyām iti dhiyā
prayatnāt tvām eva praṇaya hṛdayā yāmi śaraṇam
parokṣam vṛṣṇīnām nibhṛta nibhṛtam karṇa kuhare
hareḥ kāku unmiśrām kathaya sakhi rādhā vidhura tām
parīrambham premṇā mama sa vinayam kaustubha maṇau
bruvāṇaḥ kurvīthāḥ pataga vara vijñāpanam idam
agādhā rādhāyām api tava sakhe vismṛtiḥ abhūt

original: kathaṃ vā kalyāṇaṃ vahati tarale hi praṇayitā //123
analyzed: katham vā kalyāṇam vahati tarale hi praṇayitā
muhur kūjat kāñcī maṇi valaya mañjīra muralī
rava ālambaḥ bhrāmyat yuvatī kula gītaiḥ su ramaṇe
sa kim sākṣāt bhāvī punar api hareḥ tāṇḍava rasaiḥ
navīnaḥ tvam kambo paśupa ramaṇībhiḥ paricayam

original: na dhatse rādhāyāḥ guṇagarimagandho.api na kṛtī /
analyzed: na dhatse rādhāyāḥ na kṛtī
tathā api tvām yāce hṛdaya nihitam dohadam aham
vahante hi klānte praṇayam avadāta prakṛtayaḥ
gṛhītvā govindam jaladhi hṛdaya ānandana sakhe
sukhena śrī vṛndāvana parisare nandatu bhavān

original: kathaṃ vā te goṣṭhaṃ bhavatu dayitaṃ hanta balavān
analyzed: katham vā te goṣṭham bhavatu dayitam hanta balavān
yat etasmin veṇoḥ jayati cira saubhāgya mahimā
iti prema udgāra pravaṇam anunīya krama vaśām
parīvārān bhrātar niśamayati cāṇūra mathane
punar kopa udbhinna praṇaya caṭulam tasya nikaṭe
kathām ācakṣīthāḥ daśabhiḥ avatāraiḥ vilasitām
grahītum tvām prema āmiṣa parivṛtam citta vaḍiśam

original: mahāmīna kṣipraṃ nādhita rasapūre mama sakhī /
analyzed: mahā mīna kṣipram nādhita rasa pūre mama sakhī
viveka ākhyam chittvā guṇam atha tad agrā asi bhavatā

original: hatāśeyaṃ kiṃ vā śiva śiva vidhātuṃ prabhavati //128
analyzed: hata āśā iyam kim vā śiva śiva vidhātum prabhavati
varākī iyam dṛṣṭvā subhaga vapuṣaḥ vibhrama bharam
tava abhyarṇam bheje parama kutuka ullāsita matiḥ

original: tirodhāya svāṅgaṃ prakaṭayasi yat tvaṃ kaṭhinatāṃ
analyzed: tirodhāya sva aṅgam prakaṭayasi yat tvam kaṭhina tām

original: tadetat kiṃ na syāt tava kamaṭhamūrteḥ samucitam //129
analyzed: tat etat kim na syāt tava kamaṭha mūrteḥ samucitam
sadā kaṃsārate sphurati ciram adya api bhavataḥ
sphuṭam kroḍa ākāre vapuṣi nibiḍa prema laharī
yatas sā sairandhrī malaya ruha paṅka praṇayinī
tvayā kroḍīcakre parama rabhasāt ātma dayitā
cirāt antarbhūtā narahari mayī mūrtiḥ abhita

original: stadīyo vyāpārastava tu na yayau vismṛtipatham /
analyzed: s tadīyaḥ vyāpāraḥ tava tu na yayau vismṛti patham
vinīta prahlādaḥ tvam iha parama krūra carite
prasaktaḥ yat bhūyas para hṛdaya bhedam janayasi
yadā ātmānam darpāt agaṇita guruḥ vāmana mudā
manaḥ rājyena āḍhyam tvayi valitayā kalpitavatī
prapede tasya idam phalam ucitam eva priya sakhī
vidūre yat kṣiptā praṇaya maya pāśe nigaḍitā
iyam nā atha krūrā bhṛgu patanam akaṅkṣati
yat asyām kaṭhinām tava samucitam tat bhṛgupate
asau te durbodhā kṛtiḥ iha bhavat vismṛti patham
yatas jātaḥ sākṣāt guruḥ api sa nandīśvara patiḥ
nirānandāḥ gāvaḥ ciram upasṛtāḥ dūṣaṇa kulaiḥ
kharāyante sadyas raghu tilaka govardhana taṭīḥ
virādha tvam ghoṣaḥ vrajati bhavadīya pravasanā
didānīm mārīcaḥ sphuṭam iha paritas
prasannaḥ kālaḥ ayam punar udayitum rāsabha janaiḥ
rvilāsin adyā api sphuṭam anaparādhāḥ vayam api
vitanvānaḥ kāntim vapuṣi śarad ākāśa valitām

original: kṛto na tvaṃ sīradhvaja bhajasi vṛndāvanamidam //135
analyzed: kṛtaḥ na tvam sīradhvaja bhajasi vṛndāvanam idam

original: na rāgaṃ sarvajña kvacidapi vidhatte ratipatiṃ
analyzed: na rāgam sarvajña kvacid api vidhatte ratipatim
muhur dveṣṭi droham kalayati balāt iṣṭa vidhaye
ciram dhyāna āsaktā nivasati sadā saugata rati

original: stathāpyasyāṃ haṃho sadayahṛdaya tvaṃ na dayase //136
analyzed: haṃho sadaya hṛdaya tvam na dayase
parikleśa mlecchān sa mada madhupa ālī madhurayā
nikṛnta tronta praṇaya kalikā khaḍga latayā
tvam āsīnaḥ kalkin iha catura gopa āhita ratiḥ
sa deśam kurvīthāḥ pratimudita vīra adhikam idam
iti prema udghāṭa sampuṭita vacaḥ bhaṅgiḥ akhilam
tvam āvedya klidyan mukha parisaraḥ locana jalaiḥ
tatas govindasya prativacana mādhvīka padapī
m upāsīnaḥ dṛgbhyām kṣaṇam avadhīthāḥ khaga pate
praṇetavyaḥ dṛṣṭeḥ anubhava patham nanda tanayaḥ
vidheyaḥ gopīnām bhuvana mahitānām upakṛtiḥ
iyam yāmaiḥ gamyā mathurā api
r iti dvaidham na antar kalaya kalahaṃsī kula pate
apūrvā yasya antar vilasati mudā sārala ruci

original: rvivektuṃ śakyete sapadi milite yena payasī /
analyzed: śakyete sapadi milite yena payasī

original: kathaṃ kāraṃ yukto bhavatu bhavatastasya kṛtinā
analyzed: katham kāram yuktaḥ bhavatu bhavataḥ tasya kṛtinā
vilambaḥ kādambī ramaṇa mathurā saṅgama vidhau
prapannaḥ premāṇam prabhavati sadā bhāgavata bhāj

original: ciraṃ ko.api śrīmān jayati viditaḥ śākaratayā
analyzed: ciram kaḥ api śrīmān jayati viditaḥ śākara tayā
dhurīṇaḥ dhīrāṇām adhi dharaṇi vaiyāsakiḥ iva
rasānām ādhāraiḥ aparicita doṣaḥ sahṛdayaiḥ
prabandhaḥ ayam bandhoḥ akhila jagatām tasya sarasām
prabhoḥ antar sāndrām pramada laharīm pallavayatu
